about_the_game:
A fistful of RADs, for all the supplies a Merc could desire. RADs are used as in-game currency to buy Loadout Cases, Mercs and Cosmetic Items.

Contains:
  • 4,200 RADs
  • 1x Prime Loadout Case
detailed_description:
A fistful of RADs, for all the supplies a Merc could desire. RADs are used as in-game currency to buy Loadout Cases, Mercs and Cosmetic Items.

Contains:
  • 4,200 RADs
  • 1x Prime Loadout Case

name: Dirty Bomb - Medium rad Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB - GeForce 7800GTX
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB - GeForce 710 or better
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card

short_description: A fistful of RADs, for all the supplies a Merc could desire. RADs are used as in-game currency to buy Loadout Cases, Mercs and Cosmetic Items.Contains:4,200 RADs1x Prime Loadout Case
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
